bibl.title: The Love Spell of PGM IV. 94-153: Introduction and Structure.
Acts of the Second International Congress of Coptic Studies. Roma, 22-26 September 1980
bibl.author: Meyer, Marvin W.

bibl.note: P.G.M. IV, 94-153 is transmitted in Coptic, with brief passages in Greek. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Translation. - 3. Structure. - Notes.
bibl.seg: Meyer Marvin W., The Love Spell of PGM IV. 94-153: Introduction and Structure.
Tito Orlandi and Frederik Wisse (Edd.), Acts of the Second International Congress of Coptic Studies. Roma, 22-26 September 1980 (Roma, 1985) pp. 193-201.
